name: Shady Brook
storyline: Author Jake Torrent moves to the small, peaceful country town of Shady Brook. At first, everything seems idyllic. But after a resident commits suicide, Jake starts to suspect foul play. Could this town take part in a conspiracy to cover up a murder? As Jake investigates, he gets more than he bargained for: a town secret so terrifying that there is no turning back...
summary: This game seems like point and click game and hidden object or somewhere in between.
